html: Dear #twitterFamily, thanks for pouring out your love on me Humbled to reach #15MillionFollowers. As they say - you don’t choose your family, they are god’s gift to you. You all are my gift, my family & my strength. . . #15MLove #TwitterArmy #Blessed
text:
Dear #twitterFamily, thanks for pouring out your love on me  
Humbled to reach #15MillionFollowers. As they say - you don’t choose your family, they are god’s gift to you. You all are my gift, my family & my strength. 
.
.
#15MLove #TwitterArmy #Blessed

html: My tributes to #MajorDhyanChand on his birth anniversary & #NationalSportsDay! Sports is been my life since a very young age & I emphasise that everyone should make sports a part of their lives not just for health but it also imparts determinations, passion & hard work in you!pic.twitter.com/ADlJQ0x9NJ

html: Leaders live exemplary life to make our world better & that’s what #AtalBihariVajpayee ji did for India. Most of us grew up in his remarkable leadership and saw our country shaping up in a super power! It’s end of an Era & a moment of extreme grief! #RIP #AtalBihariVajpayeepic.twitter.com/K1imIcfm9I

html: Extremely saddened by the news that former Indian cricket captain #AjitWadekar is no more. He led India to many historic victories! My condolences to the friends & family! RIP Sir, you will always be missed!
text: Extremely saddened by the news that former Indian cricket captain #AjitWadekar is no more. He led India to many historic victories! My condolences to the friends & family! RIP Sir, you will always be missed!

html: #MyIndependenceDay spent with our hero’s on #WagahBorder today!Feeling is unexplainable...Goosebumps, teary eyes & immense love for our nation!Salute to our Jawans & big shoutout to you all to do whatever it takes to support our armed forces & their families!#HappyIndependenceDaypic.twitter.com/9tR57nbElf
text: #MyIndependenceDay spent with our hero’s on #WagahBorder today!Feeling is unexplainable...Goosebumps, teary eyes & immense love for our nation!Salute to our Jawans & big shoutout to you all to do whatever it takes to support our armed forces & their families!#HappyIndependenceDaypic.twitter.com/9tR57nbElf

html: We are free, we are independent, It’s the sacrifices of our hero’s which made us ascendant. Those sacrfices are not to forget, not to abet, I urge each Indian to pay their debt with humanity, hard work & sweat. Salute to my immortal India #HappyIndependenceDay
text:
We are free, we are independent,
It’s the sacrifices of our hero’s which made us ascendant.

Those sacrfices are not to forget, not to abet,
I urge each Indian to pay their debt with humanity, hard work & sweat.

Salute to my immortal India 
#HappyIndependenceDay

html: It’s #worldBreastFeedingWeek and to celebrate this Gracia Raina Foundation conducted a Successful workshop on #breastfeeding. The Workshop conducted by Dr. Achla & Dr. Dipti Chopra included teaching breastfeeding techniques to mothers with their babies and dolls!pic.twitter.com/FbNmN1VLOb
